short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Challenge Checklist of 100 Books To Read. The Book Checklist Keeps Count For You!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How many books have you read in your lifetime?
Do you think you can conquer the 100 books challenge?

We've developed a checklist of 100 very popular books both old and new that would be a challenge for even the most avid readers to read.

The book reading challenge checklist is designed to keep a running tab for you, so you can keep track of how many books you've read, and how many you have to go in order to complete the challenge. 

It's a fun way to challenge yourself to read.

It's also a great tool for readers, book clubs, and book groups to engage and create endless dialogue on many books for perhaps years to come. 

If you want to create a personal reading goal then this is what you need, and the great part about it is that it sits right there in your browser.

We're also going to create a section for you to recommend a book that's not on the 100 book reading challenge checklist.

Are you still reading?

Go ahead and start now with the 100 Book Reading Challenge!

Click the install button on the top right hand side of the page.

See you inside!
